column4: He had to leave, but I told him I would help you with adding windows to your grub..ok?
all went well, i reinstalled gutsy, grub works flawless, everything is ok
gksudo gedit /boot/grub/menu.lst
Great, he asked me to look after you when you got back
thank you both guys, everything's back again, say hi to devron
Glad to hear it..   will let him know.. thanks
btw, whats the difference between gksudo and sudo ?
gksudo is for gui apps.. it is dangerour to use sudo for gui apps.. see the link that follows
ok, thanks; another one: is it reliable to edit grub loader pic with qgrubeditor ?
I always use gksudo gedit myself  or sudo nano  etc
I always use fwcutter for that chipset/card..
but fwcutter is used for extracting firmware, i want to switch drivers...
I got that..  I just pointing out I had good results without ndiswrapper
oh, ok. sorry. how can i 'switch' drivers ?
That isnt my area of knowledge... someone will know..
where to look? any irc channel?
repos will have the latest tested and stable release, not the newest
so 0.9.48 is not stable release?
It may be considered stable...  but not tested and added to the repos ...  it may be in HArdy already
If you know it is OT why do you still ask in here
got a sec?
they are not what he thinks they are
erm...
is linux-generic required to boot the system?
